title: Do Bluetooth printers work with smartphones? - Quora

response.answer_text: Thanks for A2A. Do Bluetooth printers work with smartphones? The primary reason for implementing Bluetooth on a printer is so that it can be used by a smartphone or tablet. Some phones are smart enough to identify a printer on a wifi network, but the Bluetooth functionality ensures that it can be found.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by M. Vincent Holguin
